item.description:
Let's meetup at 6:45, the movie starts at 7:10 and we will want to head into the theater by 6:55 so we can get good seats together.


The name of the Movie is 88 Minutes

Starring: Al Pacino, Alicia Witt, Leelee Sobieski, Amy Brenneman, Deborah Kara Unger, Benjamin McKenzie, Neal McDonough

Genre: Thriller

Official Website:

http://www.88minutest...

Plot Summary: In "88 Minutes," Al Pacino stars as Dr. Jack Gramm, a college professor who moonlights as a forensic psychiatrist for the FBI. When Gramm receives a death threat claiming he has only 88 minutes to live, he must use all his skills and training to narrow down the possible suspects, who include a disgruntled student, a jilted former lover, and a serial killer who is already on death row, before his time runs out.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Boston Movie Group Badge. If the movie is upstairs, I will try to grab a table near the windows by the coffee vendor or I will be standing nearby. If it is downstairs, I will be inside the ropes by the concession stand.
item.why: Anyone who loves movies and talking with people who do will love our group. We go see the film together and then go out and grab a bite and talk about...what else...movies!
item.name: 88 Minutes
